title: Prices
description: Maximum opportunities at the lowest prices

cards.title: Express delivery
cards.description: The fastest and most expensive tariff plan, which provides for the delivery of the parcel as soon as possible (for example, within 1-2 hours). Such a tariff can be especially useful if the cargo being shipped requires fast delivery.
includedFeatures: On time or free of charge (from 1 day)
Insurance is free at a declared cost of up to 999 Rub

cards.title: Standard Delivery
cards.description: This tariff plan ensures delivery of the cargo within 1-2 business days. It is usually less expensive than express delivery, but still provides fast enough delivery
includedFeatures: Free of charge at a declared value of up to 999 â‚½, further 0.8% of the estimated value of the investment
Insurance is free at a declared cost of up to 999 Rub

cards.title: Economical delivery
cards.description: This is the cheapest tariff plan that allows you to save on the cost of delivery. However, such a tariff implies longer delivery times (for example, from 3 to 7 working days), which may be inconvenient if you need to deliver the cargo quickly
includedFeatures: Compulsory insurance for 3,000 rubles (the fee from the sender is 24 rubles).

cards.title: International delivery
cards.description: If you need to send cargo abroad, the delivery service can offer an international tariff plan. Such a tariff may include customs fees and other additional costs associated with the shipment of goods across the border
includedFeatures: Insurance at the discretion of the sender
Countries: Russia, Belarus, Kazakhstan, Armenia, Kyrgyzstan
